name: ShootOut Single Basketball Game
discription:
Exciting arcade-style basketball!



Includes timer and electronic scoring for 1-2 players and magnetic scorers for accurate scoring Comes with 7/8” steel tubing with 2 mini 7” basketballs and air pump Quick connect easy-to-assemble frame that sets up in just minutes and folds for storage Assembled size is 81” x 81” x 26-3/4”W
